description: Elegant croc-embossed handbag in rich brown with a structured silhouette. Features a signature V-shaped gold clasp, sturdy top handle, and detachable shoulder strap for versatile styling. Perfect for both everyday wear and formal occasions.

title: Slippers
description: Elegant flat sandals in rich brown leather with a bow-style front strap and double-strap support. Lightweight and comfortable, ideal for daily wear

title: Navy White Polo
description: Stylish two-tone polo shirt featuring a navy top with white body and sleeves. Lightweight, breathable, and perfect for casual or semi-formal wear.

title: Classic Navy and White Colorblock Polo Shirt
description: Stylish two-tone polo shirt featuring a navy top with white body and sleeves. Lightweight, breathable, and perfect for casual or semi-formal wear

title: Luxury Croc-Embossed Handbag – Black with Gold Accents
description: Elegant croc-embossed handbag in glossy black, featuring a structured top handle with gold-tone hardware and a signature V-shaped clasp. Perfect for both formal and casual outings.
